Requirement.formula: #program; var stageInstance = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RockStage')); if(isNULL(stageInstance)) { return true; } var stageJobs = Building::getActiveJobs(stageInstance); var numJobs = Array::size(stageJobs); if(numJobs < 4) { return true; } return false;
